Roger Hu

Software engineer, problem solver, ex manager Deloitte, Northwestern University grad with dual degrees in Economics and Mathematics.

Passionated about learning new programming languages and frame works to solve real world problems.

Skilled in web development using Ruby on Rails and NodeJS for backend, PostgreSQL and MongoDB for database, React and Redux for for frontend, Python and D3.JS for data visualization.

FlashCode

Live | Repo
A flash card system with a built-in spaced repetition function

  • Create review cards by directly fetching data from LeetCode API
  • Automatically set up review schedule based on user comfortability rating
  • Built with React, Redux, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB

Live | Repo
Interactive data visualization on Kobe’s career achievement against each team
